product_name: Inside the Box: How Crossfit Shredded the Rules, Stripped Down the Gym and Rebuilt My Body
long_description: Get an insider's look at the merits, benefits and culture of the CrossFit(R) fitness movement in. Author: T.J. Murphy. Softcover; 179 pages; black-and-white photographs. Velo Press; copyright 2009. . Author delves into history, basic ideas, training, diet, sample exercises and the community that surrounds the CrossFit phenomenon.
short_description: Get an insider's look at the merits, benefits and culture of the CrossFit(R) fitness movement in Inside the Box: How Crossfit Shredded the Rules, Stripped Down the Gym and Rebuilt My Body .
